title: Director Leonel Vieira on Hit HBO Max Thriller ‘The Scream,’ on Building Suspense and Finance and Working the Portugal-Spain Axis (EXCLUSIVE)
description: Portuguese suspense thriller series “The Scream” (“O Grito”), directed and produced by Leonel Vieira, has quickly become one of the key calling cards of Portugal’s fast-evolving drama scene.  Produced by Lisbon-based Volf Entertainment in co-production with p…
content:
Portuguese suspense thriller series “The Scream” (“O Grito”), directed and produced by Leonel Vieira, has quickly become one of the key calling cards of Portugal’s fast-evolving drama scene.
